channel.title: Two PHP Questions
channel.description:
Hey Moparisthebest I have a way to insert an event into a database, but I want to make a page with links to all of the events, and when you click on them, it goes to that events information, including it in the layout page. How could I do this?
Also, how could I make an image gallery without using MySQL? Kinda like the one at http://www.pwnds.info?page=pics
Thanks a lot!

item.title: Two PHP Questions
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“java jar, post:1, topic:144571”]Hey Moparisthebest
I have a way to insert an event into a database, but I want to make a page with links to all of the events, and when you click on them, it goes to that events information, including it in the layout page. How could I do this?

Also, how could I make an image gallery without using MySQL? Kinda like the one at http://www.pwnds.info?page=pics

Thanks a lot![/quote]

Just mysql query and get all the url and label rows from the database and put them into table format.

Then you could open the same page with a get variable appended on the url, and then query for the event information.

Or you could learn some AJAX and do it without reloading the page.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Exception wrote:

http://www.google.com would be your best bet. What your asking is pretty involved, and providing more specific info would be helpful as well. This community does not spoon feed people
